thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com
thread.title: Ian Walker-Munro
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Ian Walker-Munro

author: Ian Walker-Munro
title: Ian Walker-Munro
text:
Products are beautifully presented and the material and colours are lovely and are very fantastic to wear.
Sizing has to be carefully checked initially, as it is small by European sizing, Lilysilk size 18/XL is more like European size 12/14.
Also product on receipt has to be checked that it is the size ordered, and not a size bigger or smaller due to incorrect labelling.
Delivery is first rate, no issue.
